agent_purpose: Coordinates email scanning and Slack notification workflow, aggregates delegation results
description: Manager agent that orchestrates Email Scanner and Slack Notifier sub-agents to process emails, extract delegatable tasks, and notify teammates via Slack

example_response.summary: Scanned the last 10 Gmail emails, extracted delegatable tasks with assignees and priorities, and sent Slack notifications to assigned teammates in the #slack-test channel.

actual_test_response.summary: Scanned the last 10 Gmail emails, extracted delegatable tasks with assignees and priorities, and sent Slack notifications to assigned teammates in the #slack-test channel.
